briefTitle: Efficacy/ Safety of Omalizumab in Patients With Seasonal Allergic Asthma and Seasonal Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis
officialTitle: A Randomized, 20 Week, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group, Multiple-dose, Multicenter Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Omalizumab in Combination With Depigoid, Versus Depigoid Only, in Adult and Adolescent Patients With Seasonal Allergic Asthma and Comorbid Seasonal Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis - Open-label Depigoid Monotherapy Extension Periods 2007 and 2008-
summary: Efficacy/ safety for the combination of anti-IgE (Omalizumab) and specific immunotherapy (Depigoid) in patients with not adequately controlled seasonal allergic asthma and comorbid seasonal allergic rhinoconjunctivitis.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Recorded daily during the 2007 and 2008 pollen season
